dialogue.String: Those ��explosives��--pretty amazing, aren't they?1�
Indeed. Without them, we would not have been able to dig that mine.Now, finally, we can compete with San d'Oria for power.1�
Heh, Quadav aren't good enough to live in there! One blast should take care of them...1�
What is the matter, Babenn?1�
Lord Raogrimm... We've found the Quadav temple in the mines, as you suspected.I-I could not stop them.1�
That is unfortunate... As always, they don't even try to understand.1�
Huh. Nothing.With all the Quadav guarding the place, you think we'd find a treasure or two!1�
C'mon, let's move! Let's just finish this job and go.1�
Ulrich, wait!1�
As I thought...they were trying to protect their eggs...1�
But they don't even try to understand...1�
Is that all you've got, Raogrimm!?1�
Ulrich, why!?1�
Why? Because I never liked you, that's why!1�
You will never get away with this, Ulrich!1�
...Cornelia!?1�
Wh-what have I done!?1�
I...couldn't let you die here, Raogrimm... There are people who need you...1�
Cornelia!!!1�
No... NOOOOO!1�
So, that's what magicite looks like.1�
You are too late...I have already awakened.1�
Your rage, cowardice, envy, arrogance, and apathy...from these I will spread the bane that will destroy Vana'diel.1�
Who are you!?1�
Your kind awakened me...and this time, you will be destroyed!1�
You cannot stop me.Vana'diel will be the grave for you and all your kind!1�
The Shadow Lord!? It can't be!His powers couldn't have returned!?1�
Then it is true.The beastmen are trying to bring back the Shadow Lord.1�
...Be careful.1�
Huh?Adventurer?1�
You there! Help Orc friend!1�
Gah hah ha! Turtle cowards!Gedwad's plan work! Turtles think you Gedwad's army!Now Gedwad rest...1�
...Eh?Oh! Gedwad no say thank you to adventurer!1�
Thank you to adventurer!Gedwad saved by  !1�
How Gedwad know adventurer name?Trooper first class Raptorlegs Gedwad of Gochakzuk's Gravemakers know everything. Collecting information Gedwad's job!1�
Adventurer never hear of Gravemakers?Of course no hear of Gravemakers! Gravemakers secret team! Gravemakers...Ah! Forget what Gedwad say!1�
Gedwad use speed and cunning. Gedwad sneak into turtle lair and get information for mighty Empire.1�
But Gedwad have trouble. Turtles find Gedwad. Turtles send more guards. Now Gedwad no enter lair. Now Gedwad no use spybats...1�
Adventurer! You know why Gedwad blabber top-secret information to you?1�
You understand?You need some help.You need a friend.1�
Gedwad no need friend! Gedwad need Orcish axe to slice adventurer head!Adventurer more stupid than Orc!1�
Oh! Adventurer smart as Orc!Let Gedwad explain mission! Adventurer sneak into cave. Check turtle forces.1�
If forces weak, Orc Empire attack and take cave! If Orc Empire take cave, less turtles for adventurers to fight! Orcs win, adventurers win!1�
Mission easy. Take spybats and hide near king.1�
Spybats do rest. When spybats get info, spybats fly back to Gedwad. When spybats fly back to Gedwad, adventurer gets gold. Easy mission! Easy mission!1�
What say?Easy mission!Good day!1�
Adventurer kill beastmen for gil, but adventurer no take beastman offer for gil. Adventurer more ruthless than Orc...1�
Noble Gedwad like noble adventurer spirit!1�

But adventurer ugly face no good for mission. Turtles no stupid. Turtles see adventurer, turtles kill adventurer. Turtles kill adventurer, Gedwad mission fail, Gochakzuk eat Gedwad liver for breakfast!1�
Adventurer need disguise...1�
Oh! Gedwad remember see lady make bone helmet in country of tasty Taru. Maybe she make you good disguise!1�
Gedwad stay here. When adventurer ready, come fast. Gedwad no like wait. Gedwad get hungry...eat spybats...1�
Adventurer slow. Gedwad give adventurer new name--Stubbylegs  . Gah ha hah!1�
Eh? What thing on Stubbylegs's head?1�
Quadav disguise?Turtle horde stupid, but not that stupid...1�
Wait... Maybe adventurer have plan!Yes! Adventurer have plan. Use funny helmet to fool stupid Quadav! Right?1�
Here. Take spybats. Put spybats somewhere inside cave.1�
When done, come back here. We wait for spybats together.1�
